entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then periods of snow. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
